name: AskAARP
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: a. a. r. p.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Ask AARP offers 3 skills in which you can learn more about AARP’s stance on issues and legislation that affect you. Take action via AARP's Raise Your Voice skill, Play games to test your memory via Staying Sharp Memory Game from AARP, and listen to your flash briefing by adding AARP Now News to your Flash Briefing in the Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
